title: Date race
body:
Hi,

Just using logrus in my project and running with "go run -race" I see this output:

```
==================
WARNING: DATA RACE
Read by goroutine 8:

      /home/angel/go/projects/src/github.com/Sirupsen/logrus/entry.go:41 +0xaa

      /home/angel/go/projects/src/github.com/Sirupsen/logrus/entry.go:84 +0x373

      /home/angel/go/projects/src/github.com/Sirupsen/logrus/entry.go:119 +0xb0
  github.com/Sirupsen/logrus.(*Logger).Info()
      /home/angel/go/projects/src/github.com/Sirupsen/logrus/logger.go:122 +0x148
  bitbucket.org/soyangel/pricealert/log.Infof()
      /home/angel/go/projects/src/bitbucket.org/soyangel/pricealert/log/log.go:23 +0x162

```

In my file log.go loggers are created like this:

``` go
 var log = logrus.New()
 var errorLog = logrus.New()

 func init() {
     log.Out = os.Stdout
     errorLog.Out = os.Stderr
 } 
```
